scripts.build: npm run build:runtime-env && npm run build:webpack
scripts.preview: npm run preview:runtime-env:gen-js && npm run preview:runtime-env:interpolate && npm run preview:webpack
scripts.preview:runtime-env:interpolate: [ -f dist/index.html.bak ] || cp dist/index.html dist/index.html.bak && cp dist/index.html.bak dist/index.html && runtime-env interpolate --env-file .env --input-file dist/index.html --output-file dist/index.html
scripts.test: npm run test:runtime-env && npm run test:jest
scripts.test:runtime-env: runtime-env gen-ts --output-file src/runtime-env.d.ts && runtime-env gen-js --env-file .env --output-file public/runtime-env.js
